The target entity is equal to QuoteDtl value

PcDocRulesExpr.LValue: QuoteDtl.WarrantyCode = Inputs.chk_overridewarranty.Value == true && Inputs.var_warrantycode.Value != "" ? Inputs.var_warrantycode.Value : Inputs.chr_warranty.Value;
OrderDtl.WarrantyCode = Inputs.chk_overridewarranty.Value == true && Inputs.var_warrantycode.Value != "" ? Inputs.var_warrantycode.Value : Inputs.chr_warranty.Value;
